attributes.action: get MPS and other civil service personnel to have their pay worked on performamce, targets .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we feel that with the rate of rise in the wages and expenses, patlimentary members should get penalisd, in a form  from set performance targets.And also review their working timetable /number of holidays etc... and a review on excessive expenditure,

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
